name: Werther's Hot Toddies
description: A hot toddy is the perfect drink for cold winter nights. Add a Werther's candy to your next cup for an extra caramel flavor. It's the perfect addition and makes the drink even better to cuddle up with.

ingredients.ingredient: cinnamon sticks, plus more for garnish

directions: Place crushed Werther's on a shallow plate, and caramel on a separate shallow plate.
Dip rims first in caramel, and then in crushed Werther's.
In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine water, whole Werther's, and cinnamon sticks.
Stir constantly until candies are fully melted.
Turn off heat and stir in lemon juice and whiskey.
